meanings.definition: The quality or state of being fuzzy.
meanings.sent1: The fuzzinesses of the blanket made it extra cozy.
meanings.sent2: She struggled to see through the fuzzinesses of the fog.
meanings.sent3: The fuzzinesses of the kitten's fur made it look like a little cloud.
meanings.sent4: The artist captured the fuzzinesses of the clouds in the painting.
meanings.sent5: The fuzzinesses of the memory slowly faded with time.

meanings.sent1: The fuzzinesses in his explanation left us confused.
meanings.sent2: The fuzzinesses in the photograph made it hard to identify the subject.
meanings.sent3: The fuzzinesses in the recipe resulted in a strange-tasting cake.
meanings.sent4: The fuzzinesses in her mind cleared up after a good night's sleep.
meanings.sent5: The fuzzinesses in communication can lead to misunderstandings.
